metadata.name: sph3re #1/1024
metadata.description:
This digital performance borrows the teachings of sacred geometry to explore the creative potential of the sphere and the complexity that resides within it. 
Through balance and order, we can reveal the creation of complexity.
The rendition of universal geometry in this virtual installation merely reveals the inherent complexity of the spheres by applying the teachings of Euclidean space. 
This process is achieved without artificial effects and follows the orders and efficacies of pure materials, which thus manifest in a cyber-simulated realm with light, atmosphere, and aura. Just like the spheres, the individualâ€™s true potential can only unfold in resonance with others. 


Behold one of the basic, yet most complex geometrical bodies: the sph3re. 
This token can only reveal its true potential once shared. 
Its purpose is to create new ash holders but you may use it to reward existing ashlings. 
The choice is yours.


thespheres.xyz
